name: Ripper (itch) (kirmanator)
description:
Controls:

Movement - Left, Right

Hide behind objects/come out of hiding: Up/Down

Menu navigation - Up, Down, Enter, Backspace

Toggle Pause - P

Stealthily sneak up to your victims as Jack the Ripper in this 2D side scrolling thriller. Late at night, these victims are easily startled; be ready to blend in with your environment and remain in the shadows.
